message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item not only boasts a remarkable value of $15000 to me, but it also comes with a suite of features tailored to enhance your experience. Considering its unique qualities and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer for you to acquire this product at a special price of $14500. This is an opportunity to own a piece that combines functionality, elegance, and value, all at a price that reflects its true worth while allowing you to enjoy significant savings. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.
